meanings.definition: A device used in poultry farming to trap hens and collect their eggs.
meanings.sent1: The farmer checked the trapnests every morning for fresh eggs.
meanings.sent2: The trapnests were set up in the chicken coop to catch the hens.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous fox tried to open the trapnests but got a surprise instead.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a maze of trapnests, each leading to a different outcome.
meanings.sent5: The trapnests gleamed in the sunlight, promising a bountiful harvest of eggs.

meanings.definition: The act of using trapnests to monitor egg production in chickens.
meanings.sent1: The study of trapnests revealed interesting patterns in egg laying.
meanings.sent2: Farmers relied on trapnests to track the productivity of their hens.
meanings.sent3: The competition for the fastest egg in the trapnests was fierce among the chickens.
meanings.sent4: Her notebook was a trapnests of data, waiting to be analyzed.
meanings.sent5: The trapnests hummed with activity as the hens went about their daily routine.
